name: AS_1_3_Provider_s_On_Call_Location
title: AS.1.3 Provider's On Call Location (Function)
description: Provide provider location or contact information when on call.
purpose: The provider immediate contact information. This may include on call practitioners on a facility's premises as well as on call contact information (e.g., phone number, pager, cell phone, etc.) after scheduled working hours.

statement.label: AS.1.3#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to manage information on a provider's location, and/or contact information when the provider's is "on call".
